lead_paragraph: The 20 teams in the English Premier League agreed to examine proposals to expand the regular season and play 10 games overseas starting in 2010-11. The matches would be played at five sites around the world over a single weekend in January 2011. Each city would play host to one game on Saturday and one on Sunday. The international round would be in addition to the traditional 38 home and away matches each of the clubs currently play.
